Level 2 - Cave lake


        a1  a2  a3      
        |   |   |      
        |   |   |       |
b1      b2--b3--b4      b5
  \    /    |     \    /
   \  /     |      \  /
    c1      |       c2          j2
    |       |       |          /  \
    |       |       |         /    \
d1--d2      r3      d3--d4..j1--j3--j5..j6
    |       | .     |         \    /
    |       |  r6   |          \  /
e1--e2      r2      e3--e4      j4
    |       | .     |
    |       |  r5   |
f1--f2      r1      f3--f4
    |       | .     |
    |       |  r4   |
    g1      |       g2
   /  \     |      /  \
  /    \    |     /    \
h1      h2--h3--h4      h5 
        |   |   |      
        |   |   |      
        i1  i2  i3 
       
       
i2 - Entrance from level 1
b5 - Entrance to level 3
f4 - Inn. With darts board
r1,2,3 - Rope bridge. Player can tie rope from rope shop (e4) 
and climb to under the bridge room (r4,5,6). Only one rope can be tied. 
Looking under bridge will show what room you will climb down.
r4,5,6 - Under rope bridge. One of rooms will have flower for quest. 
Another will be empty. Third one will have BIG spider in it. 
Spider will block player to "climb up". Spider will be hard challenge for 
legend players, and totally unkillable for less than legend. 
It will have poison and special. After killing the spider, player will
be able to cut its mandible (good dagger).
Special syntax of "cut web" will be given to drop spider into water. Then
player will be able to climb up.

d1,e1,f1,h1,b1 - Goblin living caves with kids and women.
a1,a2,a3 - Rack rooms. Rooms with racks that randomly generates low quality EQ. Racks are protected by guards.
i1,i3 - guard rooms
e4 - Shop
h5 - empty cave with moss (part of quest of level 3)

In room d4 there is player can clear rubble and jump into appeared hole and get into hidden part of cave (rooms j*).

j1 is room with strange mosaic of black, white and gray tiles. tiles of the same colour unites and goes to different rooms:
black to j2, gray to j3, white to j4.
In j2,3,4 there are goblin shamans with different auras (the same colour as tiles):
Black aura blocks all blows/specials from players whose alignment is lower than evil.
Gray aura blocks all blows/specials from players whose alignment is between evil to good.
White aura blocks all blows/specials from players whose alignment is higher than good.
Aura spell will hold 20 seconds with recharge of 10 seconds.
j5 - Shaman leader room. 
Shaman leader will cast aura of alignment of tank and will have damage special.
Shaman leader will have rare good armour.
In room there will be wardrobe that can be moved/pushed and reveal trapdoor that leads to j6.
j6 - Shaman treasury chest guarded by team of four dogs. Chest will content some gold coins and gems.

Level 2 quests:
Goblin in love:
In room d1 there is young goblin boy that has passion on young goblin girl from another family (room h1).
He wants to pass her a letter, flower (blue lotus) and cake.
Letter - boy gives it to player
Flower - In every room around lake player can cut/tear flower from water to get lotus of different colour (pink, blue, white).
         In room r4 (under rope bridge) player can reach water for blue lotus. 
Black diamond - regular rare gem.
On giving all three items to girl, player gets qxp.
Reward: 5000XP

Lets play darts:
In Inn there is a darts board.
Like in RL. Player must hit score of 501.
There is a note that explains exact syntax.
Player must complete the game in 20 attempts
Success of a dart throw depends on stats and number of previously thrown darts (stats save through reboots)
Reward: 3000XP

Nine-dart finish:
In case player succeeds to score 501 in only 9 attempts (theoretical minimum)
he gets even bigger reward.
Reward: 10000XP
